messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sandra's Radical Unschooling site
messages.msgSnippet: And BTW, Helen, you are pretty cool yourself!  I LOVE HEM!  I can hardly wait for each issue.... I know I m not the only one! Ann
messages.messageBody:
And BTW, Helen, you are pretty cool yourself! I LOVE HEM! I can hardly wait
for each issue....
I know I'm not the only one!
Ann

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sandra's Radical Unschooling site
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I have never been there, but I think Sandra is cool .  (and I ve never met her)  :) I was just this morning while walking with another homeschool Mom,
messages.messageBody:
Well, I have never been there, but I think Sandra is "cool". (and I've never
met her) :)
I was just this morning while walking with another homeschool Mom, telling
her that I wouldn't mind if she were my Mom... And.... My Mom is really
cool, always has been, and still is...
HA!!!
Sandra, thanks for YOU.... You really help us out here!!!!
Ann

> >

> >______________________________

>
> I embarrassed to admit that I only this morning found (took!) time to
> click on Sandra's link (above), and wow - what a very cool site!
>
> Nice work, Sandra - I'll tell our HEM readers about it in this next
> issue (which is going to the printer on Monday)!
>
> Helen

messages.subject: Sandra's Radical Unschooling site
messages.msgSnippet: ... I embarrassed to admit that I only this morning found (took!) time to click on Sandra s link (above), and wow - what a very cool site! Nice work, Sandra -
messages.messageBody:
At 4:17 PM +0000 3/30/01, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>Message: 16
> Date: Fri, 30 Mar 2001 10:05:17 EST
> From: SandraDodd@...
>Subject: Re: from bookwork to no work?
>
>Sandra Dodd
>______________________________
>http://expage.com/RadicalUnschooling

I embarrassed to admit that I only this morning found (took!) time to
click on Sandra's link (above), and wow - what a very cool site!

Nice work, Sandra - I'll tell our HEM readers about it in this next
issue (which is going to the printer on Monday)!

Helen
